name: solr-js2
description: A lightweight, JavaScript engine for building Solr requests

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p test/lib/jasmine-core && cp -f node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.js test/lib/jasmine-core && cp -f node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.css test/lib/jasmine-core && mkdir -p test/lib/underscore && cp -f node_modules/underscore/*.js test/lib/underscore && mkdir -p test/lib/asSys && cp -f node_modules/asSys.js/*.js test/lib/asSys
scripts.pretest: rm -f solr-js2.* && export VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && sed -E -e s/{{VERSION}}/$VERSION/ src/Core.js > src/start.js && smash src/start.js > solr-js2.js && rm -rf src/start.js
scripts.test: jasmine-node test && uglifyjs -nc -mt < solr-js2.js > solr-js2.min.js && npm run-script widgets
scripts.widgets: smash widgets/*.js > solr-js2.widgets.js && uglifyjs -nc -mt < solr-js2.widgets.js > solr-js2.widgets.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && chmod a-w solr-js2.*.js && zip solr-js2.zip LICENSE solr-js2.*.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
